description: Conservation and Sustainable Use of Medicinal Plants in Arid and Semi-Arid Ecosystems of Egypt

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Root causes of biodiversity loss and the specific threats to the conservation and sustainable use of globally significant medicinal plants and their habitats in arid and semi-arid areas of Egypt are removed
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Medicinal Plants: FSP
